channel.title: How to make a char start with 70 all stats or 80?
channel.description: how to make a char start with 70 all stats or 80?

item.title: How to make a char start with 70 all stats or 80?
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Ninja Stupid Ninja
item.description:
@Stupid_Ninja wrote:

In your player.java search for:

public player(

and scroll down until you see this:

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }
Change the bottom ones for skills (Top is HP):
‘playerLevel[i]’ – The level for each skill
‘playerXP[i]’ – The exp for each skill(Set appropriately or will not work)

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a char start with 70 all stats or 80?
